vote.title: To recognize and honor Gustavo Salazar as a Padrino of Latino Heritage Month Columbus 2024
vote.description:
Title
To recognize and honor Gustavo Salazar as a Padrino of Latino Heritage Month Columbus 2024
 
Body
WHEREAS, from September 15 to October 15 each year, Americans observe National Hispanic Heritage Month, a time to celebrate the achievements, histories, traditions and cultural diversity of Hispanic/Latino/Latinx Americans whose heritage is rooted in over 20 Latin American countries and territories; and
WHEREAS, the Latino Heritage Month Columbus Padrinos Initiative was started to honor individuals who have demonstrated ongoing dedication and commitment to the advancement and uplifting of the local Latino community; and
WHEREAS, Gustavo Salazar’s dedication to entrepreneurship materialized when he acquired La Plaza Tapatia in 2001; subsequently, Gustavo’s vision pivoted towards introducing a contemporary Mexican-style grocery store to Columbus in 2021, with the inauguration of the present La Plaza Tapatia at 255 Georgesville Rd, a grand establishment spanning over 44,000 square feet and proudly standing as Ohio’s largest Latino grocery store; and
WHEREAS, Gustavo Salazar’s commitment to supporting the local Latino and non-Latino communities remains steadfast; La Plaza Tapatia takes pride in organizing an annual back-to-school event and annual events to commemorate Mother’s Day,Father’s Day, Dia de los Niños, and other special occasions throughout the year; and
WHEREAS, Gustavo Salazar’s overarching objective to create a safe, inclusive, and fully immersive environment while contributing to and bolstering the local community remains an enduring commitment for the years ahead.; now, therefore
BE IT RESOLVED BY THE COUNCIL OF THE CITY OF COLUMBUS: That this Council does hereby recognize and honor Gustavo Salazar as a Padrino of Latino Heritage Month Columbus 2024.
